Cite this Multi-CAST data set as:

Schnell, Stefan. 2015. Multi-CAST Vera'a. In Haig, Geoffrey & Schnell, Stefan (eds.), Multi-CAST: Multilingual corpus of annotated spoken texts. Version 2311. Bamberg: University of Bamberg. (multicast.aspra.uni-bamberg.de/#veraa) (date accessed)
